displayName: Ensure that Network Security Groups RabbitMQ port 15672 access is restricted from the internet
rationale: The potential security problem with using RabbitMQ port 15672 over the Internet is that attackers can use various brute force techniques to gain access to Azure Virtual Machines. Once the attackers gain access, they can use a virtual machine as a launch point for compromising other machines on the Azure Virtual Network or even attack networked devices outside of Azure.
recommended_action:
Disable direct RabbitMQ port 15672 access to your Azure Virtual Machines from the Internet. After direct
RabbitMQ port 15672 access from the Internet is disabled, you have other options you can use to access these
virtual machines for remote management:
Point-to-site VPN
Site-to-site VPN
ExpressRoute
error_message: Security group allows ingress to RabbitMQ port 15672
ruleNames: Security group allows ingress to service management port
